bois-feuillus-premium.name: Premium Hardwood
bois-feuillus-premium.description: Our premium selection of hardwood, naturally dried under cover for over 2 years. Moisture guaranteed below 18%. Ideal for quality heating with excellent calorific efficiency.

bois-resineux-sec.name: Dry Softwood
bois-resineux-sec.description: Softwood perfect for ignition and rapid temperature rise. Naturally dried, low moisture content. Ideal as a complement to hardwood.

granules-premium.name: Premium Pellets
granules-premium.description: High-performance 100% softwood pellets. Exceptional calorific value and low ash content. DIN Plus certified.

allume-feu-naturel.name: Natural Firelighters
allume-feu-naturel.description: Natural eco-friendly firelighters made from wood fibers and natural wax. Quick ignition and odorless.
